dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: So, um, did you catch anything about the International Property Awards recently?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, um, did you catch anything about the International Property Awards recently?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah! I saw a bit about it. That big gala they had at The Savoy in London, right? Looked super glamorous.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah! I saw a bit about it. That big gala they had at The Savoy in London, right? Looked super glamorous.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards, which have recognised the finest property, architecture and interior design from around the globe for over 25 years, held a glamorous gala dinner and awards ceremony at The Savoy Hotel London on 2nd December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! And, like, it's been going on for over 25 years now, recognizing the best in property, architecture, [overlaps] and interior design worldwide.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! And, like, it's been going on for over twenty five years now, recognizing the best in property, architecture, and interior design worldwide.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards, which have recognised the finest property, architecture and interior design from around the globe for over 25 years...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Yeah, exactly! And can you believe the sheer scale of it? I mean, uh, I read there were over 1900 entries from 114 different countries. That's just wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! And can you believe the sheer scale of it? I mean, uh, I read there were over nineteen hundred entries from one hundred fourteen different countries. That's just wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries and scrutinised by a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Insane, right? And the judging panel isn't just, like, some random folks. It's actually chaired by four UK Lords and then over 80 global experts. Super intense scrutiny.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Insane, right? And the judging panel isn't just, like, some random folks. It's actually chaired by four U K Lords and then over eighty global experts. Super intense scrutiny.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries and scrutinised by a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. I mean, Stuart Shield, the president, he said winning one of these is an "instantly-recognised symbol of excellence." That really, um, stuck with me.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. I mean, Stuart Shield, the president, he said winning one of these is an instantly-recognised symbol of excellence. That really, um, stuck with me.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The award winners logo is an instantly-recognised symbol of excellence throughout the global property industry... - said president of the International Property Awards Stuart Shield.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's not just a fancy trophy, is it? It really proves you've got the necessary qualities and professionalism to stand out globally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's not just a fancy trophy, is it? It really proves you've got the necessary qualities and professionalism to stand out globally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Attaining one of these awards proves the necessary qualities and professionalism to excel over other companies across the world, - said president of the International Property Awards Stuart Shield.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And it's not just one or two things, either. It covers like, 48 different categories, both residential and commercial.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And it's not just one or two things, either. It covers like, forty eight different categories, both residential and commercial.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Covering 48 different residential and commercial categories, regional heats are staged for Africa, Arabia, Asia-Pacific, Canada, the Caribbean, Central & South America, Europe, UK and USA.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Right! And they have these regional heats, you know, for Africa, Europe, Asia-Pacific...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right! And they have these regional heats, you know, for Africa, Europe, Asia-Pacific...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Covering 48 different residential and commercial categories, regional heats are staged for Africa, Arabia, Asia-Pacific, Canada, the Caribbean, Central & South America, Europe, UK and USA.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Oh, and even the Caribbean and Canada! Plus, um, Central and South America. It's truly global.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and even the Caribbean and Canada! Plus, um, Central and South America. It's truly global.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Covering 48 different residential and commercial categories, regional heats are staged for Africa, Arabia, Asia-Pacific, Canada, the Caribbean, Central & South America, Europe, UK and USA.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I know! And they had galas in Bangkok, London, Toronto during the year too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I know! And they had galas in Bangkok, London, Toronto during the year too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These have been celebrated at gala presentation events in Bangkok, London and Toronto during the course of the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: So it's, like, the world's largest and most wide-ranging programme in the industry. Pretty impressive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's, like, the world's largest and most wide-ranging programme in the industry. Pretty impressive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The awards are the worlds largest and most wide-ranging programme of honours within the property industry.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Stuart Shield also mentioned standards are soaring ever higher, which is, uh, great to hear.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Stuart Shield also mentioned standards are soaring ever higher, which is, uh, great to hear.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I am delighted to see the standards soaring ever higher across all categories. - said president of the International Property Awards Stuart Shield.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: It really sets the bar, doesn't it? For excellence in property.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really sets the bar, doesn't it? For excellence in property.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Makes you wonder what incredible designs will be, uh, recognized next year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Makes you wonder what incredible designs will be, uh, recognized next year.
